exits.ZD Grotto Island:
can_autojump or is_future or can_swim or
                can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (mm_ice_arrows and can_use(Ice_Arrows))

locations.ZD Chest: is_past and 'Zoras Domain Room 01 Chest Torches'

exits.ZD Grotto Island:
can_swim or is_future or can_wade(120) or
                (mm_ice_arrows and can_use(Ice_Arrows))

exits.Zoras Domain:
can_swim or is_future or can_use(Hover_Boots) or
                (mm_ice_arrows and can_use(Ice_Arrows)
exits.ZD Water: can_swim or can_sink or is_future or can_wade(120)

locations.ZD Diving Minigame: is_past and (can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(120))
locations.ZD GS Frozen Waterfall:
is_future and at_night and
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Bow) or Magic_Meter
                or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Slingshot)
                or (logic_zd_gs_bombs and has_explosives))

exits.ZD King Zoras Water: can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(20) or is_future
exits.ZD Water: is_future or can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(120)

events.Eyeball Frog Access:
is_future and 'King Zora Thawed' and 
                (Eyedrops or Eyeball_Frog or Prescription or 'Prescription Access')

locations.ZD Gossip Stone: can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(20) or is_future
locations.Gossip Stone Fairy:
(can_swim or can_wade(20) or is_future) and
                can_summon_gossip_fairy_without_suns and has_bottle

exits.ZD King Zoras Chamber:
((can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(20)) and can_climb(30)) or
                is_future
exits.ZD High Dive Practice Spot: can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(20) or is_future

exits.ZD Behind King Zora:
(can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(10) or is_future) and
                (Deliver_Letter or zora_fountain == 'open' or
                (zora_fountain == 'adult' and is_future) or
                (is_future and can_climb(145)) or can_climb(160))
exits.ZD King Zoras Chamber:
(can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(10) and can_climb(30)) or
                is_future

exits.ZD King Zoras Throne:
(can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(10) or is_future) and
                (Deliver_Letter or zora_fountain == 'open' or
                (zora_fountain == 'adult' and is_future) or
                (is_future and can_climb(144)) or can_climb(160))
exits.Zoras Fountain: can_swim or can_sink or can_wade(10) or is_future
